[accordionItem title="When?" icon="fa fa-clock-o"]
This event begins on November 23rd, 2013 at 8:00pm Eastern Time and runs until 11:00pm - Rain or shine.
[/accordionItem]
[accordionItem title="Where?" icon="fa fa-road"]
100 Avenue Lane, Ottawa Ontario
<iframe src="https://maps.google.ca/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=en&geocode=&q=Ottawa,+ON&aq=0&oq=ott&sll=43.837085,-79.565941&sspn=0.387314,0.891953&ie=UTF8&hq=&hnear=Ottawa,+Ottawa+Division,+Ontario&t=m&z=9&ll=45.42153,-75.697193&output=embed" width="100%" height="350" frameborder="0" marginwidth="0" marginheight="0" scrolling="no"></iframe>
[/accordionItem]
[accordionItem title="What to bring?" icon="fa fa-suitcase"]
Be sure to bring some sunscreen lotion and a hat and an umbrella. Food and drinks will be provided by our staff.
[/accordionItem]
[accordionItem title="Entrance Fee" icon=" fa fa-money"]
The entrance fee for this event is $20. All proceeds will be donated to the Hope foundation.
[/accordionItem]
[/accordionGroup]
